sentences.sContent: The girl had no chance of escape.
Christina hoped it wouldn’t be too long before she could make her escape.
sentences.sCn: 克里斯蒂娜希望她很快就能逃脱。

sentences.sContent: They had a lucky escape (= were lucky not to be hurt or killed ) when a car crashed into the front of their house.
sentences.sCn: 一辆汽车迎面撞上了他们的房子，他们没有受伤真是幸运。

sentences.sContent: He narrowly escaped death in an avalanche.
sentences.sCn: 他在一次雪崩中死里逃生。
